entry.title: About
entry.summary: Cogency Capital focuses on narrative & trend-based investments using quantitative methods. Cogency collects data from sources such as social networks, web traffic, structured & unstructured data sets, financial data and evaluates this data using statistical & machine learning methods to make probabilistic market predictions.
entry.content: Cogency Capital focuses on narrative & trend-based investments using quantitative methods. Cogency collects data from sources such as social networks, web traffic, structured & unstructured data sets, financial data and evaluates this data using statistical & machine learning methods to make probabilistic market predictions.
